values: 可能性；机会；困难；不利条件；投注赔率；（力量、权力或资源上的）优势

word_group.brief_definition: 没有关系；无关紧要；非常肯定
奇迹般地活下来；克服困难；获得出乎意料的成功
极不均等赌注；极为偶然的机会；极为渺茫的机会
很大的可能性；很大的胜算

bilingual.source: The odds of winning the lottery are very low.
What are the odds of it raining tomorrow?
bilingual.target: 明天会下雨的可能性有多大？

bilingual.source: The odds of finding a parking spot here are slim.
bilingual.target: 在这里找到停车位的可能性很小。

bilingual.source: She calculated the odds of getting a promotion this year.
bilingual.target: 她计算了今年升职的可能性。

bilingual.source: The odds are in your favor if you prepare well for the exam.
bilingual.target: 如果你为考试做好准备，成功的可能性会更大。
他有一半的可能性要迟到。
赛跑前，胜负的可能性变得接近了。
赛跑前，胜负的可能性变得接近了。

bilingual.source: The odds against another attack were astronomical.
bilingual.target: 再发动一次攻击的可能性极小。

bilingual.source: The European Space Agency pegs the odds even longer.
bilingual.target: 欧洲航天局认为的可能性更小，

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Those are all the things I'm responsible for. I had to go with the odds, Rach.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是我负责的事。我得考虑所有的可能性。

yingyinNormal.en: Great odds. But that meant a year of torture, the loss of my leg, and, still, a 15 percent chance it might fail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 几率很大。但是那意味着接下来一年要饱受折磨，还有截肢，仍然还有15%的可能性我活不下去。

yingyinNormal.en: And the odds of digging around in me without causing either a massive stroke or a bleed-out are close enough to zero to pass for it in any math I know of.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要给我动手术而不引起大中风或大面积出血的概率据我经验，可能性几乎是零。

yingyinNormal.en: Wow! I know! What are the odds?
yingyinNormal.zh: 哇啊！是啊，这什么概率哦。

yingyinNormal.en: The odds were against you even with their blessing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 即便他们支持你，你的胜算都不大。

yingyinNormal.en: What are the odds you're all named after Columbus's ships.
yingyinNormal.zh: 名字刚好都跟哥伦布当年的船名一样，不容易啊。

yingyinNormal.en: I love Selena Gomez. I bet you $50 million she wins. And I'll give you 3-to-1 odds. 3-to-1 odds? Okay, I'll take that bet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我爱赛琳娜·戈麦斯，我出5000万美元赌她会赢，我给你3比1的赔率。3比1的赔率？我赌。

yingyinNormal.en: And how can a man die better than facing fearful odds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 人最辉煌的死法莫过于以一敌万。

yingyinNormal.en: One match, one pistol, and one idiot. I'll take those odds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一根火柴，一把手枪，加一个白痴，我愿意赌一把。

yingyinNormal.en: Odds are, you'll qualify for tax credits to help you afford it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很可能,你符合税收减免的条件,可以帮助你负担起这一支出。

yingyinNormal.en: On the day of the fair, all six chicks hatched. What are the odds?
yingyinNormal.zh: 科技展览会上，六只小鸡成功孵化，这不是做梦吧?

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I'm aware of the risk, Admiral. What are the odds of success?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道有风险，上将。胜算有多大？

yingyinNormal.en: Tonight. Oh, man. What are the odds of that happening? You take your time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今晚。怎么会有这么巧的事情发生呢？慢慢想吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on Howard, The odds of us picking up girls at bar is practically zero.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拜托，霍华德，我们在酒吧泡妞的成功率几乎为零。

yingyinNormal.en: What Horatius said was, how can a man die better. Than facing fearful odds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 赫雷修斯说的是，人最辉煌的死法。莫过于以一敌万。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, you know I was thinking, what are the odds like if you stuff like 200 of them in there?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那如果两百个胚胎进去，机率会不会高一点？

yingyinNormal.en: That's a really good hand for Selena. Good odds. In fact, her chances of winning this hand are 87%.
yingyinNormal.zh: 赛琳娜这手牌真的很好，胜算很大，实际上她有87%的概率能赢这局。

yingyinNormal.en: And the odds that a few of them just might give us an advantage over runaway artificial intelligence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有一定的机率其中有一部分人能帮我们对付失控的人工智能。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, I don't mind betting against the odds. If I did, I wouldn't be consulting for Democrats in Texas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，我不介意做困难大的事，否则，我也不会在德州为民主党做顾问了。

yingyinNormal.en: Nelly Yuki has her sights set on Yale, too. What are the odds of them accepting two girls from Constance?
yingyinNormal.zh: 奈莉·幽奇也要去耶鲁大学，多奇怪啊，他们竟然接收两个来自康斯坦斯的女孩。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: pl-n. 赔率；机会；可能性；优势平衡；势均力敌；优势

word_family.mean: adj. 反常的；奇怪的；单数的；奇数的；偶然的；偶尔的；单只的；不成双的；不是一对的；错配的

examination_example.sentence_trans: 与其先前的裁决不一致

examination_example.sentence: This top-down conception of the fashion business couldn't be more out of date or at <highlight>odds</highlight> with the feverish world described in Overdressed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种自上而下的时尚商业理念已经过时，也与《过度着装》（Overdressed）中描述的狂热世界格格不入。

sense_info_list.en: the chances or likelihood of something happening or being the case

word_usage.usage:
be at odds with sb.  over/on sth.  指”（就某事）与……有分歧”，如：
He's always at odds with his father over politics. 
他在政治上总是与他父亲的意见相左。

examination_example.sentence: The next time you consider eating fallen food, the <highlight>odds</highlight> are in your favor that you can eat it without getting sick.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下次你考虑吃掉落的食物时，你吃完后不生病的概率是很高的。

sense_info_list.en: superiority in strength; power; or resources

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
